verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3303>as<s%> <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G1248>ministering<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>, it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4053>superfluous<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> the forwardness <S%G4288>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4288>mind<s%>, for <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> to them of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%> was <S%G3903>ready<s%> a <S%G4070>year<s%> <S%G575>ago<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2205%G1537>zeal<s%> hath <S%G2042>provoked<s%> very <S%G4119>many<s%>.

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2745>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> should be in <S%G2758>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G3004>said<s%>, ye may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3903>ready<s%>:

<S%G3381>Lest<s%> <S%G4458>haply<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G532>unprepared<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3363>(that<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%>) should be <S%G2617>ashamed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G5026>same<s%> <S%G5287>confident<s%> <S%G2746>boasting<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G2233>thought<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they would go <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> make up <S%G4294>beforehand<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2129>bounty<s%>, whereof ye had notice <S%G4293>before<s%>, that the <S%G5026>same<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2092%G3779>ready<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a matter of <S%G2129>bounty<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I say, He which <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he which <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1909%G2129>bountifully<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1909%G2129>bountifully<s%>.

Every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G4255>purposeth<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart<s%>, so let him give; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1537%G3077>grudgingly<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> a <S%G2431>cheerful<s%> <S%G1395>giver<s%>.

<S%G2531>(As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He hath dispersed <S%G4650>abroad<s%>; he hath <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G3993>poor<s%>: <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he that <S%G2023>ministereth<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> to the <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5524>minister<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> your <S%G1035>food<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> seed <S%G4703>sown<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G837>increase<s%> the <S%G1081>fruits<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>;)

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G1248>administration<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3009>service<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2076%G4322>supplieth<s%> the <S%G5303>want<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G4052>abundant<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgivings<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>;

Whiles <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1382>experiment<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministration<s%> they <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3671>professed<s%> <S%G5292>subjection<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> for your <S%G572>liberal<s%> <S%G2842>distribution<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men;
